author: oching
msg: applied patch submitted by nicolas de loof
- remove the assertion that legacy path have no classifier. Simply have no way to support unstandard classifiers.
- automatically use "-javadoc" and "-sources" classifiers for path with types "javadoc.jars" and "java-sources". Check for the classifier to
be detected in the version string and remove it.

author: jcompagner
msg: Default ObjectInputStream should override resolveClass so that the IClassResolver is used when the class is not found

author: jcompagner
msg: test for null request cycle in bind()

author: jlaskowski
msg: Add openejb.debug profile to enable debuggingo
Run mvn with -Popenejb.debug and surefire will wait till you attach a debugger to port 5005
